hero.headline: Rapidly prototype delightful motion inside your Next.js app.
hero.subheading: This playground ships with Framer Motion so you can try interactions, validate easing curves, and copy snippets straight into your production features.

body.prefix: Need another motion primitive? Create a component under
body.suffix: (or a feature slice) and import it here to keep the lab tidy.

motionLayout.overviewSubheading: Jump back to the main lab to pick another experiment.
motionLayout.heading: Motion demos
motionLayout.subheading: Pick an interaction to explore and fine-tune live.

timelineReveal.title: Timeline reveal
timelineReveal.description: Elements pop into view with a staggered timeline.

ecologyMatrix.title: Ecology matrix
ecologyMatrix.description: Plant specimens grouped by canopy, understory, and floor to plan spatial motion.
